text: I finished the video with Aria Minae and figured out where in the code the the tooltip header background color is read from (the exercise to reader challenge at the end). However, I wasn't sure how to switch from "inspecting" to "editing" mode, so I wasn't able to apply the change. Going through this javascript specific example was really nice, I'll update here as I make my way through the newer "Live" episodes :slightly_smiling_face:
